name: In the Depths of This Dungeon - Demo
name_original: In the Depths of This Dungeon - Demo
description:
In a small kingdom, a mysterious message is received by the king from an unknown sender. It claims that... "Impending doom approaches and your people shall suffer the consequences of your naive ruling". Fearing for his own death, while not being concerned of that of his people, the king is in panic. "in the depths of this dungeon, - says the royalty's wizard - lies unprecedented power for those who are capable of taking it".

The ruler, lacking the necessary militar resources for an exploration, has a brilliant idea: 

"Send the peasants in a crusade, those who return empty handed shall be executed!"

And so, your journey begins. Playing as the people of this small kingdom who are sent 1 by 1 on an adventure, unbeknownst of the dangers that await them in the depths of this dungeon.
